transcript:
Customer: Ji, hello.
Hello.
Executive: Yes, ma'am. Shivani baat kar rahi hoon.
Customer: Haan, ma'am. Main yeh poochh rahi hoon ki aap background toh white kar denge na?
Executive: Ma'am, mujhe pata check karna padega pehle background ka. Kyunki editing na hamari side se hoti nahi hai. Agar aap hame jaise photos vagarah provide kar dete hain na, woh photos hum add kar dete hain aapka.
Customer: Ma'am, woh toh main bhi kar lungi na. Uska do minute ki editing hi nahi hai woh toh. Woh toh main bhi kar sakti hoon.
Executive: Ma'am, actually editing agar honi hoti hai toh kya hai, ek toh proper photos de dete hain aap, woh sari cheezein edit kar dete hain. Aise toh possibility hi nahi hoti ki hum edit karein ya phir kuch bhi extra cheezein add karein.
Customer: Theek hai, aap ek kaam kariye. Maine na product description dala hai. Ek baar bas product description dekh lijiye. Matlab meri listing mein aisa kuch dekh lijiye ki haan koi matlab yeh toh nahi ki bhai kuch editing karne ki zarurat hai ya product description change karne ki zarurat hai.
Executive: Dekho ma'am, description se itna matter nahi karta hai. Matter karta hai ki product ki listing ke catalog mein kya name pada hua hai, woh matter karta hai. Ki aapka product jaise maan lo aapne stainless steel water dal rakha hai apna product, theek hai. Ab woh Google pe kis naam se search kar rahe hain log, woh matter karta hai. For example, abhi jaise aapne is uh yeh main aapka stainless steel wala le leti hoon. Ab categories kaun-kaun si isme chal rahi hai woh main bata deti hoon. Jaise ek hai category insulated steel water bottle, theek hai? Teesri category stainless steel vacuum flask.
Customer: Haan, actually temperature temperature dalne se problem kya aa rahi hai? Temperature mein woh jo Chinese bottle aati hai na jispe temperature mention hota hai. Jispe temperature dikhta hai. Woh uski inquiry aane lag gayi thi sari ki sari. Sari ki sari usi ki aane lag gayi thi mere paas.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Toh hum toh woh banate hi nahi hai na. Problem yeh aayi thi us wali mein. Maine pehle temperature bottle dala tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Toh isliye mujhe baad mein change karna pada.
Executive: Aur thermo flask?
Customer: Thermo wala toh maine dal hi rakha hoga na kahin na kahin toh.
Executive: Aapko dekho main batati hoon categories. Aapki ek category padi hui hai sirf stainless steel water ki, theek hai. Ab isme jo mere paas related categories aa rahi hai main ek baar woh bata deti hoon. Related aa rahi hai stainless steel vacuum flask. Yeh I think already added hai. Phir temperature water bottle, woh toh aap mana kar rahe ho. Phir steel sipper water.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aur ek hai normal water bottle.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Toh normal water bottle daloge aap toh koi si bhi bottle aayegi, plastic vagarah sab aa jayenge. Toh uska toh koi matlab nahi hai. Theek hai? Ek second. Main sari categories pehle aapke dekh leti hoon. Kyunki main hamara category hi hota hai. Ab jaise yeh hai ek thermo flex.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji haan.
Executive: Thermo flask. Achha, sorry flask.
Executive: Thermo flask, ma'am. Yeh add kar sakti hoon.
Customer: Thermo flask hai?
Executive: Haan haan haan. Haan toh woh kar rakha hai maine. Woh kar rakha hai maine.
Executive: Ek minute main check kar leti hoon.
Customer: Refresh karke check karega ma'am. Abhi aapse baat karte karte hi hai maine.
Executive: Achha, ek minute aap hold karo.
Executive: Aapka catalog toh proper theek hai ma'am. Usme catalog mein toh koi issue nahi hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ma'am, main bol rahi hoon ki ma'am catalog toh aapka achha bana hua hai. Usme toh koi issue nahi hai. Even editing ki bhi koi zyada zarurat nahi hai isme. Aapne bahut achhe se maintain kiya hua hai.
Customer: Ma'am, aur maine sabko 100 out of 100 receive de rakhi hoon ma'am. Mere ko koi bhi dikkat nahi hai. Toh ma'am mere paas business kyun nahi aa raha hai?
Executive: Aapne yeh jo maine lead bheji hai woh aapne consume ki?
Customer: Haan ma'am, wohi karne lag rahi thi ma'am.
Executive: Aapko abhi ek hi month hua hai na?
Customer: Yes, ma'am.
Executive: Haan, toh ma'am dekho aapko na aisa nahi hai ki aap kuch aap yeh samajh ke rakhiye. At least aapko teen se chaar mahine toh lagenge hi lagenge. First of all toh aapko visibility banane mein lagega. Toh aisa nahi hai ki visibility aapki ek din mein ban jayegi, do din mein. Woh dheere-dheere hi banegi ma'am.
Customer: Ma'am, lekin mujhe toh customer mil jaye na jinko main khud reach kar sakti hoon. Mere paas inquiry nahi aa rahi hai main samajhti hoon. But main jinko reach kar sakti hoon mujhe woh toh mil jaye.
Executive: Wohi cheez ke liye toh main aapko samjha rahi hoon. Reach mein toh aapke paas tabhi ho payenge ma'am jab aapke catalog page kya hoga ki aap daily vagarah post.
Customer: Ma'am, abhi toh yahi hai. Hello.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Haan, Neeraj aa gaya hai do minute mein sir.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji ma'am. Haan. Haan, toh ma'am yeh keh rahi hoon ki aap thoda sa time rakho, maintain rakho. Aapke paas aisa nahi hai lead nahi aayegi. Aayegi. Bas thoda sa time dene ki zarurat hai.
Customer: Ma'am, main yeh keh rahi hoon chaliye lead ab aap jab aayegi woh aap logon ne kaha theek hai. But main toh reach kar sakti hungi customers ko.
Executive: Haan, aap reach kar sakte ho. Aapke paas main bheji toh hai lead ma'am.
Customer: Woh toh aapne aap bheji hai na. Woh toh main ab dekh hi rahi hoon ma'am unse kya hota hai. Woh toh aapne aap bheji hai na. Main yeh toh keh rahi hoon ki jab aapko pata hai ki abhi mere ko time kam hua hai, mere paas apne aap customer nahi aayega toh at least aap log mujhe week mein do baar call karke mujhe leads toh de sakte hain.
Executive: Haan, sure, sure, sure, bilkul ma'am. Wohi cheez ke liye main aapko samjha rahi hoon.
Customer: Nahi nahi, main aise nahi keh rahi ki aapko.
Customer: Aapki Vidushi ji ke paas time nahi hai ma'am. Main aapko yeh keh rahi hoon aapne unko itne sare clients de diye woh bechari pressure se dab gayi hai.
Executive: Nahi ma'am, aisa nahi hai. Maine aapke kya hai account manager change karwa diye. Ab accounts main hi handle karungi. Vidushi abhi nayi hai, koi baat nahi. Main toh ma'am starting se hi 150 clients sambhalti aayi hoon. Aise mujhe kabhi dikkat nahi hui hai. Aap tension mat lo.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am. Please aap mujhe week mein do baar call arrange kar dijiyega aur yeh jo aapne Trade India Mart diya na ma'am ispe isi pe ek guide bhejti hoon.
Executive: Haan. Aapko koi issue aayega toh aap mujhe batana. Aap mere is number pe call karna directly.
Customer: Theek hai ma'am. Main aapka number save kar leti hoon. Thank you so much.
Executive: Haan. Aur abhi suniye ma'am, main aapka ticket band kar di kyunki jo aapne account manager change karne ke liye open kiya tha na. Toh theek hai. Toh usme aap clear hum years kar dena aapko.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Maine jo lead bheji hai aap pehle usko ek baar consume karo.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Okay.
Customer: Mobile toh aayega hi nahi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants background of product photos to be white.

- Business is not increasing.

- Wants leads via weekly calls.



Resolution:

- Explained that editing is not done from their side.

- Explained about product listing and catalog names.

- Explained about visibility and time required.

- Account manager has been changed.

- Will receive a call twice a week.

- Closed the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to consume the lead sent.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, leads, product listing, account manager
